entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 18.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending late this evening then cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 18. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly cloudy. Temperature falling to minus 22 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h early in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 22 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 32 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 24.
